title: The Former Witch Reincarnated as A Village Girl - Novel Updates
image: https://cdn.novelupdates.com/images/2019/08/元魔女は村人の少女に転生する-cover-1.jpg
tags: Clever Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Heroes   Magic   Previous Life Talent   Reincarnation   Sword And Magic   Witches
author: Chococurry   チョコカレー
description: Shatifal the witch of wisdom was subdued by the hero in an event called Witch Hunt. Right before she died, however, she cast a forbidden magic and reincarnated as/into(?) a daughter of a human. She was reborn as a girl called Shatia with her memories and magic still intact. Shatia will walk through the human world for her further pursuit in the path of magic.>
